title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 1900.2 - Introduction
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 1900.2 - Introduction

State Regulations
(a) The act creates
a public benefit corporation, to be known as the Housing Trust Fund Corporation
(the corporation), to administer the Low Income Housing Trust Fund

Program. (b) Four types of projects
are eligible for assistance under this Part: homesteading, cooperatives, condominiums and rental projects. (c) The Housing Trust Fund Corporation shall
refer any application for payments, grants or loans from persons of low income
to other eligible applicants who are not persons of low income in the area in
which such low income persons reside. (d) In addition to the eligibility of the
applicants and proposed projects, the act and these regulations establish
certain requirements with respect to the selection of tenants and/or owners
subsequent to construction, rehabilitation or conversion, and the rental or
resale of projects assisted under this Part for periods set forth
herein. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
1900.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
